mapper.select: select C.cart_no , SI.SOURCE_IMG_STOREDNAME , S.source_name, S.source_no, source_price, bpm, key from cart C left join source S on C.source_no = S.source_no left join sourceimginfo SI on C.source_no = SI.source_no where C.user_no = #{userNo}
select count(*) from cart where user_no = #{userNo} and source_no = #{sourceNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (CART_NO, SOURCE_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES( cart_seq.nextval, #{sourceNo}, #{userNo})
